item.title: Project 4: Deep Feed-Forward Neural Networks: Regression and Classification models
item.description: Link to GitHub Repository Images from the MNIST dataset Identified images in the MNIST dataset by implementing two deep feed-forward neural networks in PyTorch, treating the identification as a regression problem and a classification problem. I compare the regression and classification models and provide summary statistics about their efficacy For the regression-neural-network, evaluating on the training data showed a MAE of 0.5291415 and a MER of 0.3993. Evaluating on the testing data showed a MAE of 0.
